domain.name: TV Shows

entity.name: Australia with Julia Bradbury
entity.description: In this eight-part documentary series, Julia Bradbury travels 12,000 kilometres to take in all that Australia has to offer, exploring hidden treasures, iconic landmarks and impressive sights. Julia also hopes to discover modern Australia by getting to know the locals and understanding their way of life, whether this be in central Sydney or out in the remote countryside. During her stay, Julia visits a cattle station, surfs on Bondi Beach, encounters unique wildlife and spends the day with crocodile egg hunters.

entity.description: In this eight-part documentary series, Julia Bradbury travels 12,000 kilometres to take in all that Australia has to offer, exploring hidden treasures, iconic landmarks and impressive sights. Julia also hopes to discover modern Australia by getting to know the locals and understanding their way of life, whether this be in central Sydney or out in the remote countryside. During her stay, Julia visits a cattle station, surfs on Bondi Beach, encounters unique wildlife and spends the day with crocodile egg hunters.
